link_metadata.description: The Southern Poverty Law Center’s (SPLC) “Year in Hate and Extremism” report, has named the largest conservative grassroots youth organization, Turning Point USA (TPUSA) a “hate group.” Per Daily Signal: The Southern Poverty Law Center is comparing the largest conservative grassroots youth organization to the Ku Klux Klan, adding Turning Point USA to its “hate map” that plots KKK chapters and claims to expose “the groups upholding white supremacy in the United States.” The latest version of the SPLC hate map, released Thursday, lists Turning Point USA for the first time, categorizing the group as an “anti-government extremist group.” The hate map also includes PragerU, a nonprofit that uses digital media to spread conservative ideas, putting it in the same category as Turning Point USA.
